name: @kispace-io/core
description: A highly modular and extensible web application framework for building IDE-like applications with a plugin architecture, AI integration, and comprehensive workspace management.

scripts.build: npm run build -w @kispace-io/core && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:app: npm run build -w @kispace-io/core && npm run build -w @kispace-io/app
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:api && vitepress build docs
